CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

u.a: M pours from teapot in a cup
M moves cup of tea to other side of C and house
C pours from teapot into cup
C picks up a cup; drinks from it
M bangs teapot on table to get C's attention
C pours from teapot in her cup
M and C drink from their cups together
M and C manipulate dishes and utensils
C appears to be stirring; is blocked by house; C picks up pan; looks around; M reaches for plates
M takes pan from C and dishes out eggs
C finds a fork in pile of utensils
M means pile of utensils near C
C picks up spoon from pile
M seems to be indicating plate; blocked by house
C puts oatmeal on plate with spoon
C puts oatmeal on her plate; C drops spoon
C gets a clean spoon from pile of utensils
<bef> C spoons more oatmeal on her plate
M points at dishes near pile of utensils
C hands to M; M drinks
C has a little trouble picking up cup
C holds Care-Bear feelings book; M has another book
M points at something in her book
C seems to be having trouble turning pages in book
C is reading to herself from Care-Bear book
M points at picture in C's book
there is some audio interference; hard to hear
M's hand is on opposite page
M points at page to which she has turned
C continues her story of the book
C may have thought M was going to close book
C can't seem to answer; looks back at Care-Bear book
C starts to tell Care Bear story again
M holds up her book and points
C tries to move book closer to herself
M moves book closer to herself
C squirms; looks under her chair
M turns page; C lays her head on table
M touches C; points in book
